questions: How do I apply for admission?
What is the eligibility for admission?
When does the admission process start?
admission.answer: You can apply online through our college portal. Admissions are based on entrance exams and merit. Eligibility varies by course.

questions: How much is the tuition fee?
Can I pay fees in installments?
fees.answer: The fee varies by course. For B.Tech, it's ₹90,000 per year. Hostel fee is ₹45,000. Scholarships are available for merit and reserved categories.

questions: What is the average package offered?
What is the highest package so far?
How many students got placed last year?
placement.answer: Yes, our placement cell invites companies like Infosys, TCS, Wipro, and Amazon. The average package is ₹4.5 LPA. Internships are supported for all branches.

questions: Do you have data science specialization?
What is the duration of B.Tech?
courses.answer: We offer B.Tech (CSE, ECE, Civil, Mech), M.Tech, MBA, and diploma programs. Specializations in AI/ML, Data Science, and IoT are available in CSE.

questions: Is there a hostel for girls?
facilities.answer: Yes, we offer hostel facilities for both boys and girls, a central library, sports complex, Wi-Fi-enabled campus, and college buses for transportation.

questions: How can I contact the college?
Do you have a mobile app?
Is the campus open on weekends?
contact.answer: You can call us at +91-9876543210, email info@yourcollege.edu, or visit www.yourcollege.edu. Office hours are 9 AM to 5 PM, Monday to Saturday.

questions: Do you have a CSE department?
What departments are there in your college?
Tell me about the Mechanical department
departments.answer: Our college has departments for CSE, ECE, EEE, Civil, Mechanical, MBA, Humanities, and Applied Sciences.

questions: Is there any scholarship for SC/ST students?
How can I apply for scholarships?
scholarships.answer: Yes, we offer scholarships based on merit, category, and sports achievements. You can apply via the official portal during admission.

questions: Is hostel available for first-year students?
How many students in one room?
Do you provide food in hostel?
hostel.answer: Yes, hostels are available for both boys and girls. Rooms are 2/3 sharing. Mess food is provided and included in the fee.

questions: How many internal exams are there?
When are the final exams held?
exams.answer: There are 2 internal exams and one final exam per semester. Internal marks contribute to 25% of the total. Pass mark is 40%.

questions: When is the cultural fest held?
events.answer: Yes, we organize annual technical fests, cultural fests, and sports day. The main fest is usually held in February every year.

faculty.answer: Our faculty includes experienced professors, many with PhDs. We also host guest lectures from industry experts regularly.

questions: Do you have digital library access?
Can we use library on weekends?
library.answer: Our library has 25,000+ books and digital access. Books can be borrowed for 7 days. Library is open 9 AM – 6 PM on weekdays and Saturdays.
